## How to Swirl

```{r}
# if you have not installed the `devtools` package
# install.packages("devtools") 
library("devtools")
install_github("kosukeimai/qss-package", build_vignettes = TRUE)

vignette(package = "qss") # list all vignettes
browseVignettes("qss") 

# install.packages("swirl") # install the package

install_course_github("kosukeimai", "qss-swirl") # install the course
library(swirl) # load the package

swirl()

```
